item.title: Else without If
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I have checked the common compile errors and pitfalls and what I’m adding seems to be right but it always comes up with the compile error.

My code:

} else if (inDuelArena()) { getPA().walkableInterface(201); if(duelStatus == 5) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else if(inPcBoat()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21119); } else if(inPcGame()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21100); }

Project Evolutions ‘Correct code’

if (expression) { // shit here } else if (expression) { // shit here } else { // shit here }

Error:

How is this wrong?

Read full topic
